name: The 3rd Int'l Conference on Ecosystems and Climate Change
content: The 3rd Int'l Conference on Ecosystems and Climate Change (CECC 2024) will be held during November 15-17, 2024 in Sanya, China. This Conference will cover issues on Arid lands and Desertification, Biodiversity and Biological Conservation, Disturbance Ecology and other related fields. It dedicates to creating a stage for exchanging the latest research results and sharing the advanced research methods.
